## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and files generated by add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (MonoDevelop/Xamarin Studio)
*.userprefs

# Build results
[Dd]ebug/
[Dd]ebugPublic/
[Rr]elease/
[Rr]eleases/
x64/
x86/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]/
[Aa][Rr][Mm]64/
bld/
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/
[Ll]og/

# Visual Studio cache files
.vs/
*.vsidx

# Others
*_i.c
*_p.c
*.ilk
*.meta
*.obj
*.pch
*.pdb
*.pgc
*.pgd
*.rsp
*.sbr
*.tlb
*.tli
*.tlh
*.tmp
*.tmp_proj
*.log
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
.builds
*.pidb
*.svclog
*.scc

# Packages
*.nupkg
packages/

# NuGet Symbol Packages
*.snupkg

# SQL Server files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# Backup & publish
_PublishedWebsites/
*.publishsettings

# Others
[Tt]humbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini
